full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): #, ,BSNYEN GNAS YAN LAG BRGYAD PA'I SDOMS PA 'BOGS PA'I CHO GA LAG LEN SNYIN PO BSDUS PA BZHUGS SO, ,
author's_name_(_зохиогч): NGAG DBANG BLO BZANG RGYA MTSO,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @005A *, ,MJUG TU THABS LEGS BRJOD, YAN LAG BRGYAD PA'I SDOM PA 'BOGS PA'I CHO GA NYAMS SU BLANG BDE BA 'DI NI, THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA BU STON RIN PO CHE'I GSUNG RAB KYI DGONGS DON LTAR 'JAM DBYANGS BLA MA DKON MCHOG CHOS 'PHEL GYI PHYAG BZHES SU GNANG BA LA GZHI BYAS, TSIG DON RNAMS DKYUS SU BSHAD NA RTOGS DKA' BAS NA, GSAL BYED KYI LHAN THABS LOGS SU KHA 'PHANGS TE, LAG LEN SNYING PO BSDUS PA 'DI NI, KHYIM PA RNAMS KYIS NYAMS SU BLANG BDE BA'I DU, ZA HOR GYI BANDE NGAG DBANG BLO BZANG RGYA MTSOS BYANG TAL KHAR SBYAR, ,)
